arguments.template:
<igo-entity-selector
  [store]="store"
  [multi]="false"
  [titleAccessor]="getWorkspaceTitle"
  (selectedChange)="onSelectedChange($event)">
</igo-entity-selector>
{{title | translate}}
{{title}}

{{'igo.common.confirmDialog.title' | translate}}

{{confirmMessage}}
<ng-template #target></ng-template>

<ng-container *ngIf="field !== undefined">
  <igo-dynamic-outlet
    [component]="getFieldComponent()"
    [inputs]="getFieldInputs()"
    [subscribers]="getFieldSubscribers()">
  </igo-dynamic-outlet>
</ng-container>

<mat-form-field>
  <mat-select
    [required]="required"
    [placeholder]="placeholder"
    [formControl]="formControl">
    <mat-option *ngFor="let choice of choices$ | async" [value]="choice.value">
      {{choice.title}}
    </mat-option>
  </mat-select>
  <mat-icon
    *ngIf="disableSwitch === true"
    class="igo-form-disable-switch"
    [svgIcon]="(disabled$ | async) === true ? 'checkbox-blank-outline' : 'checkbox-marked-outline'"
    (click)="onDisableSwitchClick()"
    matPrefix>
  </mat-icon>
  <mat-error *ngIf="formControl.errors">{{getErrorMessage() | translate}}</mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

<mat-form-field>
  <input
    matInput
    [required]="required"
    [placeholder]="placeholder"
    [formControl]="formControl">
  <mat-icon
    *ngIf="disableSwitch === true"
    class="igo-form-disable-switch"
    [svgIcon]="(disabled$ | async) === true ? 'checkbox-blank-outline' : 'checkbox-marked-outline'"
    (click)="onDisableSwitchClick()"
    matPrefix>
  </mat-icon>
  <mat-error *ngIf="formControl.errors">{{getErrorMessage() | translate}}</mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

<mat-form-field>
  <textarea
    matInput
    [required]="required"
    [placeholder]="placeholder"
    [formControl]="formControl">
  </textarea>
  <mat-icon
    *ngIf="disableSwitch === true"
    class="igo-form-disable-switch"
    [svgIcon]="(disabled$ | async) === true ? 'checkbox-blank-outline' : 'checkbox-marked-outline'"
    (click)="onDisableSwitchClick()"
    matPrefix>
  </mat-icon>
  <mat-error *ngIf="formControl.errors">{{getErrorMessage() | translate}}</mat-error>
</mat-form-field>
{{getErrorMessage() | translate}}

<mat-form-field class="igo-entity-selector">
  <mat-select
    [value]="selected$ | async"
    [multiple]="multi"
    [placeholder]="placeholder"
    (selectionChange)="onSelectionChange($event)">
    <mat-option *ngIf="emptyText !== undefined">{{emptyText}}</mat-option>
    <mat-option *ngIf="multi === true" [value]="multiSelectValue">{{multiText$ | async}}</mat-option>
    <ng-template ngFor let-entity [ngForOf]="store.view.all$() | async">
      <mat-option [value]="entity">
        {{titleAccessor(entity)}}
      </mat-option>
    </ng-template>
  </mat-select>
</mat-form-field>
{{column.title}} {{column.title}} {{getValue(entity, column)}}

{{ title }}

{{getKey(baseKey, property.key)}} :

<mat-list
  igoClickout
  [ngClass]="{'selectable': selection}"
  (clickout)="disableNavigation()"
  (click)="enableNavigation()">
  <ng-content></ng-content>
</mat-list>
{{title}}
{{column.title}} {{column.title}} {{getValue(row, column.name)}}

<igo-dynamic-outlet
  *ngIf="widget"
  [component]="widget"
  [inputs]="inputs"
  [subscribers]="getEffectiveSubscribers()">
</igo-dynamic-outlet>

<ng-container *ngIf="widget$ | async as widget">
  <igo-widget-outlet
    [widget]="widget"
    [inputs]="widgetInputs$ | async"
    [subscribers]="widgetSubscribers$ | async"
    (cancel)="onWidgetCancel(widget)"
    (complete)="onWidgetComplete(widget)">
  </igo-widget-outlet>
</ng-container>
